snippet: Diplomats and elected officials fear that Mr. Trump, if he loses, will severely undermine the international reputation of the American political system....
abstract: Diplomats and elected officials from both parties voice concerns over Donald Trump's suggestion that presidential election may be rigged and that he may not respect its final outcome; feel his attitude undermines American political system and could damage country's image abroad.
lead_paragraph: Diplomats and elected officials fear that Mr. Trump, if he loses, will severely undermine the international reputation of the American political system.

headline.main: Donald Trump’s Defiance Is Seen as ‘Colossal Mistake’ That Threatens U.S. Image
headline.print_headline: Trump’s Defiance Is Seen as Threat to U.S. Image
